nutritional_support_vitality.title: Multivitamin
nutritional_support_vitality.description: Adequate intake of essential vitamins and minerals is often discussed as part of maintaining overall vitality.

vitamin_d.title: Vitamin D
vitamin_d.description: Vitamin D levels can vary based on factors such as sun exposure, diet, and geographic location.

areas.energy: Vitamin D supports mitochondrial function and cellular energy production by regulating calcium homeostasis.
areas.immuneSupport: Vitamin D modulates both innate and adaptive immune responses, with low levels associated with increased infection susceptibility.
areas.musclePerformance: Vitamin D is critical for muscle strength and function through calcium regulation and muscle protein synthesis pathways.
areas.nervousSystem: Vitamin D influences neurotransmitter production and has neuroprotective effects in the central nervous system.

coq10.title: Mitokondrienäring
coq10.description: Vissa näringsämnen är involverade i mitokondriella processer relaterade till cellulär energiproduktion.

areas.energy: CoQ10 spelar en kritisk roll i den mitokondriella elektrontransportkedjan, vilket är avgörande för cellulär energiproduktion.
areas.immuneSupport: CoQ10 har antioxidantegenskaper som hjälper till att skydda celler från oxidativ stress och stödjer immunsystemets funktion.

coq10.analyzePrompt: Analysera bilden och bestäm mitokondriens behov av stöd.

cellular_energy_nad.title: NAD+
cellular_energy_nad.description: NAD+ (Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide) is a critical coenzyme found in every cell of the body. It plays a key role in cellular energy metabolism, DNA repair, and maintaining overall cellular health.

areas.energy: NAD+ is essential for the mitochondrial processes that generate ATP, the primary energy currency of the cell.
areas.nervousSystem: NAD+ supports the nervous system by aiding in cellular repair and protecting neurons from oxidative stress.
areas.immuneSupport: NAD+ contributes to immune function by supporting cellular metabolism and repair mechanisms vital for immune cells.

cellular_energy_nad.analyzePrompt: Analyze the user's NAD+ levels and suggest strategies to optimize cellular energy metabolism.

calming_glycine.title: Calming amino acids
calming_glycine.description: Glycine is an amino acid that acts as a neurotransmitter in the central nervous system. It has been studied for its calming effects and its role in promoting relaxation and better sleep.

areas.nervousSystem: Glycine acts as an inhibitory neurotransmitter, helping to calm the nervous system and reduce stress.
areas.sleepQuality: Glycine has been shown to improve sleep quality by promoting relaxation and regulating body temperature.
areas.immuneSupport: Glycine supports immune function by reducing inflammation and promoting cellular repair.

neuromuscular_training.title: Neuromuscular training concepts
neuromuscular_training.description: Neuromuscular training focuses on improving the connection between the nervous system and muscles to enhance strength, coordination, and overall performance.

areas.musclePerformance: Neuromuscular training enhances muscle strength and coordination, improving physical performance.
areas.cardioFitness: This training supports cardiovascular fitness by improving endurance and oxygen utilization during physical activity.
areas.nervousSystem: Neuromuscular training strengthens the communication between the nervous system and muscles, optimizing movement efficiency.

creatine_atp_strength.title: Creatine
creatine_atp_strength.warning: Creatine supplementation may affect kidney function in individuals with pre-existing conditions.

probiotics_microbiota.title: Gut microbiota overview
probiotics_microbiota.warning: Consult with a healthcare provider before starting probiotic supplementation if you have compromised immunity.

hiit_vo2max.title: High-intensity interval training
hiit_vo2max.analyzePrompt: The user has a goal to perform at least 2 high-intensity interval training (HIIT) sessions per week. Based on the workout log, evaluate whether the goal was achieved. Summarize progress and give encouragement or advice.

running_volume_aerobic.title: Progressive volume training
running_volume_aerobic.analyzePrompt: The user is working to increase total running distance each week. Given the workout data, analyze if there's an upward trend. Mention any signs of overtraining or progress plateaus.

multivitamin_general.title: Multivitamin
multivitamin_general.description: Essential vitamins and minerals support overall health and vitality.

nad_plus_energy.title: NAD+
nad_plus_energy.description: NAD+ is involved in cellular metabolism and energy pathways.

vitamin_d_support.title: Vitamin D
vitamin_d_support.description: Vitamin D supports immune function and metabolic health.

magnesium_relaxation.title: Magnesium
magnesium_relaxation.description: Magnesium supports relaxation, sleep quality, and nervous system function.

betaine_cardiovascular.title: Betaine
betaine_cardiovascular.description: Betaine supports cardiovascular function and physical performance.

ashwagandha_adaptogen.title: Ashwagandha
ashwagandha_adaptogen.description: Ashwagandha is an adaptogenic herb traditionally used in Ayurvedic medicine. It helps the body manage stress by supporting cortisol balance and promoting relaxation.

areas.nervousSystem: Ashwagandha supports the nervous system by reducing stress and promoting calm through cortisol regulation.
areas.energy: Ashwagandha helps combat fatigue and supports sustained energy levels throughout the day.
areas.immuneSupport: Ashwagandha has immune-modulating properties that support overall immune health.

rhodiola_adaptogen.title: Rhodiola
rhodiola_adaptogen.description: Rhodiola is an adaptogenic herb known for enhancing mental and physical performance. It helps the body adapt to stress and supports cognitive function.

areas.nervousSystem: Rhodiola supports the nervous system by reducing mental fatigue and improving stress resilience.
areas.energy: Rhodiola enhances physical endurance and reduces fatigue during demanding activities.
areas.focus: Rhodiola improves cognitive function, focus, and mental clarity, especially under stress.

holy_basil_adaptogen.title: Holy Basil (Tulsi)
holy_basil_adaptogen.description: Holy Basil, also known as Tulsi, is an adaptogenic herb revered in traditional medicine for its stress-reducing and immune-supporting properties.

areas.nervousSystem: Holy Basil helps calm the nervous system and reduce stress through its adaptogenic effects.
areas.immuneSupport: Holy Basil supports immune function with its antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory properties.

cordyceps_adaptogen.title: Cordyceps
cordyceps_adaptogen.description: Cordyceps is a medicinal mushroom known for its energy-boosting and performance-enhancing properties. It supports cellular energy production and endurance.

areas.energy: Cordyceps enhances cellular energy production by supporting mitochondrial function and ATP generation.
areas.cardioFitness: Cordyceps improves oxygen utilization and cardiovascular endurance during physical activity.
areas.immuneSupport: Cordyceps has immune-modulating effects that support overall immune health.
